snippet: Weekly unemployment filings were lower than expected, and world markets rose after the European Central Bank kept interest rates unchanged.
abstract: Stocks roar back following rocky start to the week, giving major indexes their biggest gains of 2014.
lead_paragraph: Weekly unemployment filings were lower than expected, and world markets rose after the European Central Bank kept interest rates unchanged.

headline.main: Shares Rally to Give Indexes Their Best Day of the Year
headline.print_headline: Shares Rally to Give Indexes Their Best Day of the Year
